select cbue.id,CONCAT(cb.no,'-',cbu.no,'-',cbue.room_number) as room_name,GROUP_CONCAT(ur.name) as resident_name, (case cbue.advance_payment_price is null when true then 0 else cbue.advance_payment_price end) as advance_payment_price from cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb,cpm_resident_estate as cre,user_resident as ur,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue
cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and cre.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and cre.resident_id = ur.id
and cbue.room_number like concat('%',#{roomNumber},'%')
and cbu.no = #{unitNo}
and cb.no = #{buildingNo}
and ur.name like concat('%',#{residentName},'%')
